quote: Major social movements eventually fade into the landscape not because they have diminished but because they have become a permanent part of our perceptions and experience.
All that's bright must fade, The brightest still the fleetest; All that's sweet was made But to be lost when sweetest.

It seems inevitable that the magic of the written word will fade.
